text: "Too Much to Ask" is a 2017 song by Niall Horan and is the third single from his debut studio album Flicker. It went to the top 20 in Australia, Belgium, Hungary, Ireland, Lebanon, Malaysia, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Scotland and Slovakia and missed the top 20 in the United Kingdom. == Track listing == == References == Category:2017 songs Category:Niall Horan songs
title: Too Much to Ask
